content: आवस् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (With <ab>acc.</ab>) {@--1@} To inhabit, dwell in; रविमावसते सतां क्रियायै <ls>V. 3. 7</ls>; पुरीमिमामावसत् <ls>Rām.</ls>; sometimes with <ab>loc.</ab>; <ls>Ms. 7. 69</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 320.</ls> {@--2@} To be occupied or engaged, enter upon; गृहस्थाश्रमं <ls>Ms. 3. 2.</ls> {@--3@} To take part carnally; cohabit. {@--4@} To pass, spend (as night). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To allow one to dwell, receive hospitably. {@--2@} To inhabit, settle in a place. {@--3@} To halt or encamp (for the night).
